channel.title: Upload Redash images to AWS ECR Public Gallery
channel.description:
Hey folks, could you possibly consider uploading Redash images not only to DockerHub but also to [AWS ECR Public Gallery](https://gallery.ecr.aws/?page=1)?
The reason is DockerHub imposes image pull [rate limits](https://docs.docker.com/docker-hub/download-rate-limit/) and having an alternative registry to switch to when you hit the limit would be a plus.
